attributes.action: hypothecate taxes and make the tax system more transparent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If the British people could see where taxes went and what certain taxes were spent on, they would be more included and informed - which would be fantastic for democracy. Taxes should be more linked to what the government spend them on and people should be able to see where all the money goes. This will lead to less wasteage, less hostility towards taxes and a better, more tuned tax system.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
